servinfo.title: Security Alarm Mode Selection Procedure (If Equipped)
servinfo.ptxt: Security alarm mode can be selected by performing the following procedure.

s1.ptxt: Confirm that all doors are closed, all doors are unlocked and ignition key is inserted in ignition key cylinder.
Remove ignition key from ignition key cylinder.
Perform Step a) through e) described below within 15 seconds.

s2.ptxt: Insert ignition key (1) in ignition key cylinder (2).
Remove ignition key from ignition key cylinder.
Repeat Step a) and b) twice.
Insert ignition key in ignition key cylinder.
Push lock side (3) of driver side manual lock switch (4) 3 times.

s1.ptxt: When Step 3) is complete, the mode changes to the next one automatically. After changing each mode completely, warning buzzer (located in combination meter) sounds specified times as follows.

item.ptxt: Changed from “Inactive” mode to “Active” mode: Buzzer sounds 4 times.
Changed from “Active” mode to “Inactive” mode: Buzzer sounds once
